title: Customer relationship management (CRM)
description: Customer relationship management (CRM) is a process in which a business or other organization administers its interactions with customers, typically using data analysis to study large amounts of information.
key-ideas: Software suites of tools, as well as databases and data storage.
CRM tools enable: sales, marketing, service support, billing, and contact.
CRM centralizes customer information so that it can be better anyalyzed to improve the business or organization.
CRM solutions that maintain payment information should comply with PCI-DSS standards.
